text: Taishan District Office Taishan District () is a rural district in New Taipei, Taiwan. == Geography == *Area: 19.16 km² *Population: 78,801 people (2016) ==Infrastructures== * Fu Jen Catholic University Hospital ==Government agencies== * Freeway Bureau ==Education== ===Higher education=== * Lee-Ming Institute of Technology * Ming Chi University of Technology ===High school=== * New Taipei Municipal Taishan Senior High School (新北市立泰山高級中學) http://210.71.107.5/newweb/english/ ===Junior high school=== * New Taipei Municipal Taishan Junior High School (新北市立泰山國民中學) * New Taipei Municipal Yi Shiue Junior High School (新北市立義學國民中學) ===Elementary school=== * New Taipei Municipal Taishan Elementary School (新北市立泰山國民小學) * New Taipei Municipal Ming- Zhi Elementary School (新北市立明志國民小學) * New Taipei Municipal Tong-Zong Elementary School * New Taipei Municipal Yi Shiue Elementary School ==Tourist attractions== Upper Taishan Temple * Mingzhi Academy * Cultural and Historical Image Park * Ci Xiu Park * Taishan Doll Museum * Upper Taishan Temple * Yihuekeng Natural Ecological Park * Fu-Da Night Market (Near the backdoor of Fu Jen Catholic University) ==Transportation== Taishan Station * Taishan is served by the National Highway No. 1. ===Taipei Metro=== * Danfeng Station ===Taoyuan Airport MRT=== * Taishan Guihe Station * Taishan Station ==Notable natives== * Lee Hong-yuan, Minister of the Interior (2012-2014) ==See also== * New Taipei City ==References== ==External links== *Government website Category:Districts of New Taipei
title: Taishan District, New Taipei
